name: What you need to do (from 04/04/22)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

You need to do the following to progress your ((isDivorce??divorce application.))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership.)) 

^ Your application will not be checked and issued until you have done the following:   

((divorceServedAnotherWay??# Apply to serve the divorce papers another way))((dissolutionServedAnotherWay??# Apply to serve the papers another way))
((serveWifeAnotherWay??You need to apply to serve the divorce papers to your wife another way. ))((serveHusbandAnotherWay??You need to apply to serve the divorce papers to your husband another way. ))((dissolutionServedAnotherWay??You need to apply to serve the papers to your civil partner another way. ))((papersServedAnotherWay??This is because you did not provide their postal address in the application. For example you could try to serve them by email, text message or social media.))

((papersServedAnotherWay??You can apply here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/form-d11-application-notice))

((sendDocumentsToCourt??#Send your documents to the court
You need to send the following documents to the court because you did not upload them in your application:))

((mariageCertificate??* Your original marriage certificate or a certified copy))((civilPartnershipCertificate??* Your original civil partnership certificate or a certified copy))((foreignMarriageCertificate??* Your original foreign marriage certificate))((foreignCivilPartnershipCertificate??* Your original foreign civil partnership certificate))
((marriageCertificateTranslation??* A certified translation of your foreign marriage certificate))((civilPartnershipCertificateTranslation??* A certified translation of your foreign civil partnership certificate))
((nameChangeProof??* Proof that you changed your name. For example deed poll or statutory declaration))

((sendDocumentsToCourt??Sending your documents by email: 

1. Take a photo or scan of the document
2. Check the image shows the whole document and all the text is readable
3. Attach it to an email
4. Include your reference number in the subject line: ))((conditional reference number))
((sendDocumentsToCourt??5. Email the documents to: ))((conditional court email))

((sendDocumentsToCourt??Sending documents by post
1. Write your reference number on each document: ))((conditional reference number))
((sendDocumentsToCourt??2. Post the original documents to:

Courts and Tribunals Service Centre
HMCTS Divorce and Dissolution service 
PO Box 13226
Harlow
CM20 9UG

You must post the original documents or certified copies. Your ))((sendDocumentsToCourtDivorce??marriage))((sendDocumentsToCourtDissolution??civil partnership))((sendDocumentsToCourt?? certificate will be returned to you, if you are posting it in. Other documents will not be returned.))

((isDivorce??Divorce service))((isDissolution??End a civil partnership service))
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm, Saturday 8am to 2pm)
Email: ((court email))

This is an automated message, please do not reply to this email.

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
